newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - COINTEL sells two-tranche 144a notes.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - COINTEL sells two-tranche 144a notes.

text.p: The following two-tranche 144a debt issue from Compania Internacional De Telecommunicaciones S.A. (Cointel) was priced Thursday via joint book managers Goldman Sachs and Merrill Lynch & Co Inc, according to a market source.
The first tranche consisted of U.S. dollar denominated in the second was denominated in the Argentine peso.
BORROWER COMPANIA INTERNACIONAL DE TELECOMMUNICACIONES S.A.
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 99.825 FIRST PAY DATE 2/1/1998
LAST MOODY'S N/R YIELD 8.884 PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P BB SPREAD 275 BPS CALLABLE NO
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 99.955 FIRST PAY DATE 2/1/1998
LAST MOODY'S N/R YIELD 10.384 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P BB SPREAD 425 BPS CALLABLE NO
